mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, name AS name, writer AS writer, price AS price, genre AS genre, publisher AS publisher, CNT AS cnt FROM BOOKS ORDER BY id
select id,name,writer,price,genre,publisher,cnt from BOOKS where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into BOOKS (id, name, writer, price, genre, publisher, CNT) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{writer}, #{price}, #{genre}, #{publisher}, BOOK_CNT.nextval)
mapper.update: update BOOKS Set id= #{id}, name =#{name}, writer = #{writer}, price= #{price}, genre=#{genre}, publisher=#{publisher}, cnt = BOOK_CNT.nextval where id= #{id}
